content:
# The furnace currently has 8 iron plates, but I cannot insert any iron ore because my inventory shows that I have no iron ore left. 
# This means that I need to gather more iron ore before I can smelt it into iron plates and craft the Iron Chest.

# I will locate the nearest iron ore patch again to gather more iron ore.

nearest_iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)  # Find the position of the nearest iron ore patch
move_to(nearest_iron_ore_position)  # Move to the iron ore patch location

# Now I'll harvest some iron ore from the patch to have the required resource for smelting into plates.
harvested_iron_quantity = harvest_resource(nearest_iron_ore_position, quantity=20)  # Harvest 20 iron ore

# Check the inventory for the updated state after harvesting iron ore.
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
